alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Knox (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:51PM EDT until June 16 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN HOLMES AND KNOX COUNTIES... At 350 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Berlin to Centerburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, Millersburg, Berlin, Walnut Creek, Fredericktown, Gambier, Sugarcreek, Centerburg, Danville, Killbuck, Glenmont, Farmerstown, Baltic, Martinsburg, Gann, Bladensburg and Charm. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
